videos.description: Kyle Lowry lobs Caleb Martin from beyond half court for the two-handed jam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Caleb Martin shows off his hops with alley-oop flush) 2021/11/30 ESHEET

videos.headline: Caleb Martin shows off his hops with alley-oop flush

videos.description: Bones Hyland confidently knocks down the 3-pointer from just inside half court.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Bones Hyland buries the deep 3) 2021/11/30 ESHEET

videos.headline: Bones Hyland buries the deep 3

videos.description: Nikola Jokic hits four consecutive buckets to get the Nuggets' lead up to 20 vs. the Heat.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Jokic heats up to give Nuggets 20-point lead) 2021/11/30 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jokic heats up to give Nuggets 20-point lead

videos.description: Bam Adebayo absorbs contact from Nikola Jokic for the and-1.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Bam hits tough and-1 on Jokic) 2021/11/30 ESHEET

videos.headline: Bam hits tough and-1 on Jokic

videos.description: Gabe Vincent nails a deep 3-pointer and Facundo Campazzo answers with one of his own as time expires in the third quarter.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Heat, Nuggets trade 3s to end the third) 2021/11/30 ESHEET

videos.headline: Heat, Nuggets trade 3s to end the third

videos.description: Nikola Jokic sets up Aaron Gordon for the nice alley-oop.

videos.headline: Gordon skies for alley-oop from Jokic
